    • Method Detail

      • setPaymentAccountRetrieveListener

        void setPaymentAccountRetrieveListener(IPaymentAccountManagementListener listener)
        Sets the Payment Account Retrieve listener. This can be an implementation of either IPaymentAccountManagementListener for non meta-data related methods or IPaymentAccountManagementMetaDataListener for meta-data related methods. Most of the time, app developers require to use only a subset of the methods provided by this service, therefore use of PaymentAccountManagementListenerAdapter, rather than an interface implementation is recommended.
        Parameters:
        listener - the new payment account retrieve listener
        See Also:
        PaymentAccountManagementListenerAdapter, IPaymentAccountManagementListener, IPaymentAccountManagementMetaDataListener

      • removeListener

        void removeListener()
        Removes the payment account retrieve listener and sets it to null.
        Since:
        4.4.0.2

      • retrievePaymentAccount

        void retrievePaymentAccount(String paymentAccountUri,
                          boolean includeMetaData)
        Retrieve payment account.

        Note:To get the latest account balance information, use the refreshPaymentAccountBalance(String) method. Returned PaymentAccountData from the callback method may not contain the latest account balance information.
        Parameters:
        paymentAccountUri - the payment account URI
        includeMetaData - the include meta data

      • retrievePaymentAccountWithoutBalanceRefresh

        void retrievePaymentAccountWithoutBalanceRefresh(String paymentAccountUri)
        Retrieve payment account without balance refresh.
        Parameters:
        paymentAccountUri - the payment account uri
        Since:
        3.6.0.1

      • refreshPaymentAccountBalance

        void refreshPaymentAccountBalance(String paymentAccountUri)
        Refreshes the payment account balance information.
        Parameters:
        paymentAccountUri - the URI of the payment account that balance needs to be refreshed.
        Since:
        4.0.0.2
        See Also:
        PaymentAccountManagementListenerAdapter.onRefreshPaymentAccountBalanceSuccess(AccountBalance), IPaymentAccountBalanceRefreshListener.onRefreshPaymentAccountBalanceSuccess(AccountBalance), IPaymentAccountManagerFacade.refreshPaymentAccountBalance(String), IPaymentAccountManagerService.refreshPaymentAccountBalance(String)
